title: Just A Couple Of Hockey Guys
description:
Linda and Emily start off this week's episode with the latest news of the Canadiens' new HC. After that, a full recap of NHL All Star Weekend with all the behind the scenes stories and highlights. Then, Linda wraps up with a story you can't miss!

itunes:author: ESPN, Linda Cohn, Emily Kaplan
